import React from "react"; import NavBar from "./navbar"; import SJTemplate from "./sjtemplate"; import { Slide } from "react-slideshow-image"; import ServiceCard from "./servicescard"; import Footer from "./footer"; class Sevices extends React.Component { componentDidMount() { this.props.hideNav(); } render() { const jtemp = { header: "NEED A LOGO DESIGN?", content: "We take are of your design needs ranging from logo designs, banner designs, social media ads and lots more", btnText: "START PROJECT", }; return (
{/* Controls */}
OUR SERVICES
); } } export default Sevices;
